bug.author: nullpointxr
bug.summary: Hyperlink in codelab redirects to a 404 page
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/32417>#32417</denchmark-link> URL(s) with the issue: <denchmark-link:https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/?utm_campaign=chrome_series_machinelearning_063016&utm_source=gdev&utm_medium=yt-desc#1>https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/?utm_campaign=chrome_series_machinelearning_063016&utm_source=gdev&utm_medium=yt-desc#1</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Update the link to redirect to the latest version of Tensorflow <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
Always better to redirect to a page that helps out a user, rather than keep links to 404 pages. <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
Is the link to the source code correct? <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
Server raises a 404 Page, which is an error. <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
It isn't exactly a use case. Just a QoL change. <denchmark-h:h3>Request visuals, if applicable</denchmark-h>
Are there currently visuals? If not, will it clarify the content? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41414202/67618592-17435f80-f80f-11e9-9cb1-2b4d9a44ab34.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41414202/67618594-1a3e5000-f80f-11e9-92f4-6716b871496f.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes. I love contributing in small ways, since I'm still a rather newbie developer. Errors even small should be dealt with I presume?

comments.comment:
Could I receive some help regarding the repo? Please ping me at <denchmark-link:mailto:abhishek.sankar.in@ieee.org>abhishek.sankar.in@ieee.org</denchmark-link>
Thanks!

That Codelab has been deprecated ever since TF 2.0 was released. A 2.0 version of the colab can be found at <denchmark-link:url>https://colab.research.google.com/github/tensorflow/examples/blob/master/community/en/flowers_tf_lite.ipynb</denchmark-link>
